Row.Text: I am Mvemba a Nzinga and I greet you as a friend. I can see you are blessed by God. Are you here to share your enlightenment?
I am Catherine, the Queen Mother of France, and I welcome you to the realm. I do so look forward to learning all there is to know about you.
I am Isis reborn, I am the living Nile. I am Cleopatra and an ally, if you are worthy.
Greetings. I am the Holy Roman Emperor Frederick, King of Germany, Italy, Burgundy, and many others. I trust that you will rule your lands as I do: through might.
Hello, I am Mohandas Gandhi. My people call me Bapu, but please, call me friend.
I am Gilgamesh of Sumeria and King of Uruk. Do not be afraid… I am good to my friends.
I am Gorgo, Queen of Sparta and leader of the Greeks. Who are you? What victories can you speak of?
Harald Sigurdsson stands before you: a Viking unlike any the seas and lands have ever known. Hah, are you afraid?
Hello, I am Hojo Tokimune of Japan, a humble disciple of Bushido.
Good day. It is an honor to meet you in person. It seems great minds do attract each other, after all.
Hello, I am Pericles of Athens and I greet you on behalf of the Democracy. I trust you’ll let me conduct my business with these neutral parties?
Hello, I am Tsar Peter. So, a cultured leader such as yourself must enjoy the finer things in life. Are you fond of art as well?
I am the King of Spain, Portugal, Sardinia and Sicily, Naples, Duke of Milan, etc., but most importantly, I am a devout follower of the one, true religion. I hope for your sake you are as well.
Why do you come before the Immortal Son of Heaven, the Great Qin Shi Huang?
By the grace of the one God, the powerful, the victorious, the everlasting of whose Kingdom there is no end, I greet you, my sincere friend.
Welcome to the United States of America. If you conduct yourself well, you can consider us friends.
Let it be known between us: I will repay treachery with blood! But, if you are a true friend, we will have peace.
Hail, stranger. I am the Imperator Caesar Trajan of far-reaching Rome. Who are you and what lands can you claim as your own?
Greetings. We are by the Grace of God, Victoria, Queen of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Ireland. And soon, dare I say, the empire.
Greetings traveller. You should know that you stand in the presence of greatness!
It is an honor to meet you.
Well met stranger, but I'm afraid we are too busy to stay and chat.
Before we continue, come worship with me at our nearby city. Then we can enjoy a meal of chicken moambé.
You have not lived until you have had our delicacies of food and drink. And I can show you how to use a fork, if you wish.
We have a city nearby. Would you like to visit? I'd like to introduce you to our boardgame, Senet.
As the Holy Roman Emperor, I welcome you to our land. If you wish, you can see some of its glory in the nearest city. Unless, of course, they are rebelling again.
Come to our nearest city. We can listen to the wisdom of Vedic poetry, and perhaps learn something.
The glory of Sumer is yours to see, if you wish: an ancient tradition of arts and sciences, Ziggurats too great to behold!
We have a city nearby. Would you like to visit and sample our hearty black broth?
Tell me, friend: would you like to visit our nearby city? It is no Bilskirnir, but it is nice.
I would be honored if you joined me for the ōban in our nearby city. You do like jellyfish aemono, yes?
Come to Brasil! Do you know how to dance samba? It doesn’t matter, you will enjoy the Carnival regardless.
Would you care to visit our nearby metropolis? We could debate politics before enjoying the theatre.
Come, let me show you my nearby city. Afterwards we can attend a ball at a beautiful dacha in the countryside.
Would you like to see a bullfight? There is no spectacle like it. Come to my nearby city and see for yourself.
We have a city nearby. Would you like to visit? Our sculptors are getting quite good at working in terracotta.
I am honored to offer you the hospitality of our cities: the finest arts, the most delectable feasts, and the melodious adhan heard throughout. Would you care to visit?
We have a city nearby. Would you like to visit? I could show you the stuffed bears that are now so popular.
We have a city nearby. Would you like to visit? We could fit you for one of our pointy hats.
The Empire, of course, has a city nearby. Will you come, see, and be conquered by its beauty?
It is our distinct privilege to extend to you an invitation to visit the realm, which I imagine is rather simple due to our many colonies, of course.
We have a city nearby. Would you like to visit? You could attend our upcoming celebration.
We would love to sample your hospitality.
Sorry but not at this time.
Would you like to visit our nearby city and sample our hospitality?
Thanks for the introduction, but we have no time for further pleasantries.
By all means. It will be a pleasure to see your growing city up close.
Yes, yes. This is good for us.
By all means. It will be a pleasure to see your growing city up close.
Very well.
Thank you, friend.
Thank you, friend.
Yes, we accept.
Very well.
Thank you, my friend.
Thank you, friend.
Yes. You have my gratitude.
On behalf of the people, yes.
Yes, good.
May the Lord bless you.
This is acceptable.
A fruitful offer. May Allah bless you.
I can't say no to that.
Very good.
It is acceptable.
We find this agreeable.
It is an honor to meet you.
Well met stranger, but I'm afraid we are too busy to stay and chat.
Neither of us hails from nearby, but perhaps we should mark our homelands on each other's maps?
Let us exchange information as we exchange wisdom. Tell me of your capital. Is it a holy city?
I am enamored with architecture. Tell me, does your capital have any triumphant arches, or large metal towers?
Alexandria is the home of Pharaohs, my home. I can tell you more if you tell me of your capital.
I will show you our great capital if you tell me how yours can possibly compare to Germany’s seat of power.
I enjoy travel, perhaps I will one day visit your capital. Is it far? Would you tell me about it?
None may pass the walls of Uruk without my permission, but I will tell you of it, if you tell me of your capital.
What is your capital like? Tell me, and I will tell you of Sparta.
I have travelled far and wide, but I have never seen your capital. Tell me of it.
I would like to exchange information about our capitals. Ours is as the Pure Land. What is yours like?
Let us exchange diplomatic courtesies. Tell me of your capital, and I will tell you of mine.
Athens is a glorious metropolis. What is your capital like? Come, let’s exchange information.
Would you like to exchange information of our capitals? Mine is a beacon of progress, but I do not know yours.
Would you like to hear of my capital? Madrid is the most beautiful of cities. Is your capital beautiful as well?
You have seen some of our magnificence. Is your capital even half as grand as ours?
Come, let us exchange information about our capitals. I invite you to tell me of your people, and I am happy to tell you of mine.
I’d like to exchange information about our capitals; promote free trade between our nations, and all that.
Yes, my people are nomadic, but we still have a magnificent capital. And you?
Tell me of your capital. Was it founded by lost Trojans? Or children raised by wolves?
In the interest of our political relationship, we would like to know more about your capital… in exchange for information on ours, of course.
Exchanging information on our capitals is a great idea. It should help promote trade.
Sorry, we can't give away that information right now.
